title: Save the Village
description: Defeat the goblins and protect the villagers from attack.

title: Find the Lost Sword
description: Locate the legendary sword hidden in the Dark Forest.

title: Deliver the Message
description: Take the secret message to the king in the neighboring kingdom.

title: Defeat the Dragon
description: Slay the dragon terrorizing the northern mountains.

title: Gather Healing Herbs
description: Collect 10 rare herbs from the enchanted forest for the healer.
